segments.text: Hi , Anna . I haven ’ t seen you for ages . Where have you been ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve been away on holidays for sometime .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No wonder I haven ’ t seen you recently . Where did you spend your holidays ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I went with my husband . Our first stop was Bangkok . We stayed there for 5 days . Then we flew to Hong Kong , stopover for 3 days . Our last stop was China . We visited the Great Wall .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You must have a wonderful time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . We enjoyed ourselves very much . Have you traveled much , Luke ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , my wife doesn ’ t like traveling . We haven ’ t been traveling for more than ten years . The first time we traveled together was in 1978 when we just got married . We spent our honeymoon in the Alps .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . Yeah . Some people like traveling , some don ’ t . My husband didn ’ t like traveling at first , either . He said what ’ s the use of traveling ? A waste of money and a waste of time.At last I got him on the move . After all , he loved me . We went to Bali , Indonesia , one of the most beautiful places in the world . That trip left a very deep impression on him . Since then whenever we have holidays and money , we ’ d like to patronize the travel agency . Isn ’ t it a bit dull to shut yourself at one place all your life ?
segments.speaker: S2
